p: In the last years, phytopharmaceuticals have shown an outstanding role in new drug discovery [ 18– 20]. Both in the crude form as well as pure chemical entities, a large population around the globe are getting therapeutic benefits from them [ 21– 23]. In this review article, we have aimed to overview the bioactivity studies performed on C. aurantium revealing its therapeutic potential in the light of isolated molecules and/or essential oils.
